import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import './styles/main.scss' import DrawableCanvas from './deps/drawingCanvas' const COLORS ={ RED:1, YELLOW:2, BLUE:3, GREEN:4, ORANGE:5 } const App=(props)=> { const [penColor,penColorChange]=useState(COLORS.RED) return (

Drawer

penColorChange(COLORS.RED)} className={(penColor===COLORS.RED)?"color-selected":"color"} id="color-red" />
penColorChange(COLORS.YELLOW)} className={(penColor===COLORS.YELLOW)?"color-selected":"color"} id="color-yellow" />
penColorChange(COLORS.BLUE)} className={(penColor===COLORS.BLUE)?"color-selected":"color"} id="color-blue" />
penColorChange(COLORS.GREEN)} className={(penColor===COLORS.GREEN)?"color-selected":"color"} id="color-green" />
penColorChange(COLORS.ORANGE)} className={(penColor===COLORS.ORANGE)?"color-selected":"color"} id="color-orange" />
) } export default App
